entries.name: Brian Zhan
entries.notes: Partner @ Striker Venture Partners (founding team), former Principal @ CRV, Forbes 30 Under 30 (VC), Northwestern CS, backed Skild AI/Dyna Robotics/Periodic Labs, sister is Stephanie Zhan (Sequoia GP)

entries.name: Cory Levy
entries.notes: Founder @ Z Fellows, Forbes 30 Under 30, founded After School (20M users, raised $1M at age 19), Z Fellows gives $10K grants at $1B cap, interned at Founders Fund & USV in high school

entries.name: Ali Rowghani
entries.notes: Founder @ Maxq Fund (2024, targeting $250M), former Managing Partner @ YC Continuity (2014-2023), former COO & CFO @ Twitter, former CFO @ Pixar, Stanford BA & MBA

entries.name: Nick Fitz
entries.notes: Founder & GP @ Juniper Ventures, Founder & CEO @ Momentum (since 2018), backed by Reid Hoffman/Eric Ries/Jan Leike/Woj Zaremba, AI safety/assurance focus, portfolio includes Goodfire/Haize Labs
